Pharmaceutical Supply Chain with Blockchain

Revolutionizing pharmaceutical logistics through secure, transparent, and efficient blockchain solutions

About Our Project

Our Hackathon project tackles the challenges in pharmaceutical supply chains using blockchain technology. We're creating a prototype that demonstrates how blockchain can enhance security, traceability, and efficiency in the distribution of medicines.

Blockchain-powered
Innovative Solution
Hackathon Project

Key Features

Enhanced Security

Implement cryptographic security to ensure data integrity throughout the supply chain.

Complete Traceability

Develop a system to track pharmaceuticals from manufacture to patient, reducing counterfeits.

Optimized Logistics

Create smart contracts to streamline operations and reduce delays in the supply chain.

Track a Medicine

Enter the unique identifier of the medicine to track its journey through the supply chain.
